title: Bored API Activity Schema
description: Schema definition for validating Bored API activity objects.

participants.description: The number of participants required for the activity.

price.description: The estimated price of the activity. A value of 0 indicates it's free.

link.description: A link to additional information about the activity, if available.

key.description: A unique key identifying the activity.

accessibility.description: The level of accessibility of the activity. A value closer to 0 indicates it's more accessible.
